D

deleteContact() - Static method in class Phonebook
This method is to delete a contact in array but firstly,it calls the method of searching to find the contact which the user wants to delete.Secondly,it ask the user to type the order of the wanted contact which displays in searching.The order of the contact represents its index in the array+1,then it loops on the array starting from the index of the wanted contact and makes shifting (the element =the next element).Finally it calls the method of saving to save the array with new updates.
